column2: Sour cream gives a tangy twist to this otherwise traditional banana bread recipe.

Crisp rice cereal is mixed with an assortment of dried fruit and nuts in these sweet no-bake bars. We bike and hike several times a week and take these bars with us for a tasty boost of carbs and protein. Wrapped individually and frozen, they are easy to stuff in a pack on your way out the door.
I received this recipe through a cookie exchange years ago, and it has become a favorite of family and friends.
Penne with tomato sauce and basil, easy and delicious.
